headerText: The `v-avatar` component is used to control the size and border radius of responsive images, typically used to show profile pictures.

usage.desc: An avatar accepts the `v-icon` component, an image or text. Mix and match functionality to create something unique.

profile.desc: Using the **tile** prop, we can create a sleek hardlined profile card.

advanced.desc: Combining an avatar with other components allows you to build beautiful user interfaces right out of the box.

playground.desc: The avatar has a dynamic size that can be scaled for any situation. A **tile** variation is available for displaying an avatar without border radius.
